entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom ResourceDictionary fails to load in .NET 9 app #26348
  • Entry CursorPosition won't get updated even when i set it #26347
  • [Windows] ListView ScrollTo Method Throws NullReferenceException #26345
  • [iOS] App Freezes When Pressing Return Key in Editor with Text Binding to Entry #26341
  • [ci] Investigate why our 1ES pools can t run Device Tests and UI Tests on Windows #26340
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Only few builds fail on build agent with reference to specific iOS Workload Version #26339
  • Localization: ResourceManager does not work in Android if app is built in Debug #26338
    Backlog
  • [Android]ToolbarItem Not Displaying for FlyoutPage Navigation #26330
    .NET 9 SR3
  • SwipeView causes Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot add a null child view to a ViewGroup #26328
  • [Android] IsPresented value not reflected when changing on ItemTapped in FlyoutPage #26324
  • .NET 9 Android crash: Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 2 (SEGV_ACCERR), fault addr 0x7228361bf07b in tid 4437 (.NET TP Worker) #26323
  • Build failed in Release with exit code 139 #26322

Closed

  • WKWebView Handler crash do_icall interp.c, line 2286 SIGTRAP #26314
  • [testing] Move test Issue10222 and Issue774 to appium #21267
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio XAML Editor shows error for new keyboard types on Editor and Entry controls #26321
    .NET 9 SR2
  • CollectionView does not display group header when using the new handler CollectionViewHandler2 #25718
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [testing] Appium failing to install #26305
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android, IOS, Mac] Unable to Remove Thumb Image in Slider Control #25939
    Backlog
  • XAMLC error when building an app with AoT compilation #25871
    .NET 9 SR2
  • iOS - Auth Login WebAuthenticator crash with Universal linking #21183

PullRequests

Created

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241203200400562 to main #26346
  • Update Versions.props Previous MAUI Version to 8.0.100 #26344
  • Update Versions.props Maui Previous to 8.0.100 #26343
  • Update Appium driver versions #26334
    area-testing, testing-infrastructure
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 27 #26333
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 26 #26332
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix Similar name is provided for "Icons" Present #26331
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for TableView cells become empty after adding a new cell with context actions #26326
    community ✨
  • Fix for Picker ItemsSource changed case exception: Value does not fall within the expected range #26325
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [Android] BackgroundColor for GraphicsView #26320
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241203012133186 to main #26319

Merged

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 22 #26193
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #24036
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-flakiness, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add new Keyboard enum values to KeyboardDesignTypeConverter #26329
  • Update bug-report.yml 9.0.12 SR1.2 #26342
  • Update Appium version to 2.12.2 #26306
    area-infrastructure, testing-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Fix for ItemSpacing not properly applied between the item and group header in CollectionView Horizontal LinearItemsLayout #25882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 25 #26255
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Reseting thumb image #26085
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [XC] import types in StaticResourceExtension #26303
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Add GraphicsView UiTestCategory #26307
    area-drawing, area-testing

Updated

  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titleview
  • Fix navigation stuck on iOS when pushing on hidden tab section in TabBar #22574
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • Navigation from the 'more' tab #26292
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 17 #26081
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 23 #26219
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 16 #26029
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed Extra Padding on iOS buttons required when image on top or bottom #26018
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Fix deselect item on CollectionView #26315
    area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for DatePicker displays incorrect date selection when navigating to next month. #26064
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Fixed the double tap editor freeze issue and added test cases #26203
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • Add Localization tests #25620
    area-testing, area-localization
  • Fixed [Windows] TabbedPage current page indicator can be wrong #26202
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [iOS] [Android] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #26016
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] GraphicsView DrawString - fix #26304
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [PERFORMANCE][SECURITY] Refactored Regex to cached (static readonly, Compiled, source generated, with timeout for security) #26095
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • Fix for issue 24557 Android OnKeyUp not capturing keypresses #25429
    platform/android 🤖
  • [SECURITY] `Microsoft.Sbom.Targets` nuget for package SBOM #26093
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fixed the RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand not firing issue in CollectionView #26067
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Navigating event issue when switching tabs #25749
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • 25534- Fix for Application crash on setting icon on toolbar item #26126
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
